text: Sabougla is an unincorporated community in Calhoun County, Mississippi, United States. ==History== The community takes its name from Sabougla Creek, which flows near the site. A post office called Sabougla was in operation from 1873 until 1920. ==Notable person== Leo Welch, a gospel blues musician and guitarist, was born at Sabouga in 1932. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Calhoun County, Mississippi
title: Sabougla, Mississippi
